summary: Reg and Lindsay run an organic fertiliser business. They need a fresh supply of their "secret ingredient" to process through the meat grinder. Reg comes across two guys and a girl with a broken-down vehicle on their way to a music festival.
cast: Damon Herriman|Angus Sampson|Anna McGahan|Oliver Ackland|Jamie Kristian|John Jarratt|Chrissie Page|Paul Blackwell|Ward Everaardt|Iain Herridge|Shane Darcy
keywords: blood|meat grinder|written by director|revolver|dog carrying a severed hand
title: 100 Bloody Acres
